K10D0213_H0214:218a-19: khyod ni rab tu byung ba yi //

K10D0213_H0214:218a-23: skad cig tsam du 'dir sdod de //

K10D0213_H0214:218a-25: 'di dag tu ni mthong gyur pa //

K10D0213_H0214:218b-0: @218b sor mo'i phreng ba gnyis mi ltar 'thab pa dang /
K10D0213_H0214:218b-1: cang shes ltar 'thab pa mthong ste /

K10D0213_H0214:218b-4: kye ma mi 'dul kha lo sgyur //
K10D0213_H0214:218b-5: sangs rgyas nor la bzang po mdzes //
K10D0213_H0214:218b-6: kye ma 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyis //
K10D0213_H0214:218b-7: sor mo'i phreng ba rab tu btul //
K10D0213_H0214:218b-8: rtag tu mi yi khrag gis lus byugs te //
K10D0213_H0214:218b-9: lha min dbang dang lha dang srin po dang //

K10D0213_H0214:218b-13: sems can gtum po stobs ldan gzhan dag kyang //
K10D0213_H0214:218b-14: sor phrang ming thos nyal bzhin mig btsums 'dug /
K10D0213_H0214:218b-15: de 'dra gtum po'i las byed sor phreng de //
K10D0213_H0214:218b-16: mi yi rgyal po tsam gyis ga la sod //
K10D0213_H0214:218b-17: de ni btsas ma thag tu de yi tshe //
K10D0213_H0214:218b-18: lha dang lha ma yin pa kun skrag na //
K10D0213_H0214:218b-19: mi yi rgyal po tsam lta ci zhig smos //
K10D0213_H0214:218b-20: ming gis go cha mtshon kun rdol cing snang //
K10D0213_H0214:218b-21: de ltar drag cing stobs ldan rtsal che ba //

K10D0213_H0214:218b-23: mthu dang rtsal kyang bsam gyis mi khyab mnga'//

K10D0213_H0214:219a-2: tshul khrims bral ba'i mi ni yong mi mdzes //

K10D0213_H0214:219a-6: sor mo'i phreng ba dge sbyong tshul 'dra stsal //

K10D0213_H0214:219a-13: sbrang ma lta bu khyod su zhig /
K10D0213_H0214:219a-15: ma dad pa'i sbyin pa nga len nam /

K10D0213_H0214:219a-18: khyod kyis da dung chu klung mang po ma brgal te /
K10D0213_H0214:219a-19: rang bzhin gyis gcer bus gzhan la ji ltar gos sbyin /
K10D0213_H0214:219a-20: khyod ni rang bzhin gyis gcer bu na /
K10D0213_H0214:219a-21: chos gos kyi phyir ji ltar rin thang med pa'i gos gzhan la sbyin /

K10D0213_H0214:219a-24: ba lang rgan po 'dam du song ba bzhin /
K10D0213_H0214:219a-25: ma brgal ba nyid du 'gyel bas rgan po gzhan
K10D0213_H0214:219a-26: gyi gyad stong thub pa la ji ltar brgal bar
K10D0213_H0214:219a-27: bya / de bzhin du ngas kyang khyod kyi rin
K10D0213_H0214:219a-28: thang med pa'i gos gyon na brgya byin mig stong
K10D0213_H0214:219b-0: can nyon @219b mongs pa'i bdud bye ba dang /
K10D0213_H0214:219b-1: rang bzhin gyi bdud la sogs pa dang ji ltar 'gyed /
K10D0213_H0214:219b-2: ngas ni bdud mtha' yas pa dang 'thab cing nyon mongs pa mang po zad par bya ste /

K10D0213_H0214:219b-4: sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la spyad par bya
K10D0213_H0214:219b-5: yi / khyod kyi mal cha ni de ltar gnas par mi bya'o //

K10D0213_H0214:219b-8: khyod ni dmus long du gyur pa dang khyad par med do //

K10D0213_H0214:219b-12: gtum po yin par sbrang ma lta bu khyod kyis ji ltar shes /

K10D0213_H0214:219b-17: / dge sbyong ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur /

K10D0213_H0214:219b-21: khyod ni bstan pa las phyi rol tu gyur pa'o //

K10D0213_H0214:219b-29: rin po che'i bum pa gzhan yang dpag tu med pa spangs te /
K10D0213_H0214:219b-30: mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin du rin thang med pa'i gos bor te /
K10D0213_H0214:219b-31: gang dge sbyong gi chos la nges par byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras thu bo /
K10D0213_H0214:220a-1: 'od srung chen po gnas mal nags khrod du 'cha' zhing /

K10D0213_H0214:220a-4: ci'i phyir khang pa'i gnas mal spangs shing gnas brtan
K10D0213_H0214:220a-5: 'od srung chen po bdud rtsi lta bu'i kha zas
K10D0213_H0214:220a-6: sna tshogs dang / sha'i ro'i kha zas spangs te;
K10D0213_H0214:220a-7: sha med par brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa la yang
K10D0213_H0214:220a-8: sna tshogs dang / dag par spyod / khyim nas
K10D0213_H0214:220a-9: khyim du rgyu zhing lkugs pa ma yin par lkugs
K10D0213_H0214:220a-12: glo nas med ces zer ram; gshe na'ang bde bar gyur cig ces brtan par phyir 'byung ngo //

K10D0213_H0214:220a-14: bde bar gyur cig ces brtan par phyir 'byung la /

K10D0213_H0214:220b-22: brgya byin lha'i dbang po la 'di skad ces smras so //

K10D0213_H0214:221a-4: nyan thos kyi gsod pa ste /

K10D0213_H0214:221a-7: khyod kyi yul gyi khyad par ni nam mkha' la sbrang bu'i 'phur stabs bzhin no //

K10D0213_H0214:221a-12: brgya byin khyod la dri ste /

K10D0213_H0214:252a-18: rung yang rung la mi rung yang mi rung zhes
K10D0213_H0214:252a-19: bya bar rnam pa gsum du rtog pa rnam pa
K10D0213_H0214:252a-20: gsum med do // de ni nyan thos kyi shes
K10D0213_H0214:252a-21: pa ste sbrang bu lta bu'i shes pa'o zhes mkhas
K10D0213_H0214:252a-23: mi mkhas pa rnams kyi phyir rnam pa gnyis su brtags te /
K10D0213_H0214:252a-24: de la log par nges pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chen pa'o //
K10D0213_H0214:252a-25: yang dag par nges pa zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang /
K10D0213_H0214:252a-28: ngo mtshar rnam pa gnyis te /
K10D0213_H0214:252a-29: rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na /
K10D0213_H0214:252a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa ni mchog gi gnas su ngo mtshar du gyur pa yin te /
K10D0213_H0214:252b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa las mtho @252b ba'i gnas gzhan mi snang ste ngo mtshar to //
K10D0213_H0214:252b-1: dma' ba'i gnas su'ang 'dod mang las gzhan mi snang ngo //
K10D0213_H0214:252b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams pha rol tu
K10D0213_H0214:252b-4: phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed cing 'gro
K10D0213_H0214:252b-5: ba de bzhin du 'dod chen pa'ang pha rol tu
K10D0213_H0214:252b-6: phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed cing 'gro'o
K10D0213_H0214:252b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi sbyin pa'i
K10D0213_H0214:252b-9: pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag gi bu dang
K10D0213_H0214:252b-11: sha bye ba'i phung po'i ri rab bas che ba
K10D0213_H0214:252b-12: de bas lhag par gtong ba de bzhin du 'dod
K10D0213_H0214:252b-13: chen pa'ang 'dod chen gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
K10D0213_H0214:252b-14: phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K10D0213_H0214:252b-15: 'dod chen pa'ang nam yi dvags kyi 'jig rten du
K10D0213_H0214:252b-16: song ba de'i tshe der g-yem pa'i sems skye ste
K10D0213_H0214:252b-17: / de'i tshe myur du bud med mang po 'byung ste /
K10D0213_H0214:252b-19: sems tsam gyis bde ba lta 'thob par ga la 'gyur /
K10D0213_H0214:252b-20: de nas myur du bdag gi bu bza' ba'i sems skyes nas za'o //
K10D0213_H0214:252b-21: yang las kyi sa bram ze'i gzugs su 'gyur te /
K10D0213_H0214:252b-22: des slong ba rnams la'ang bu rnams byin te /
K10D0213_H0214:252b-24: yang bdag nyid kyang thams cad za ste /
K10D0213_H0214:252b-25: de ltar 'dod chen pa'ang 'dod chen gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par 'gyur te /
K10D0213_H0214:252b-26: de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K10D0213_H0214:253a-0: de'i phyir mthon po'i gnas kyi mchog ni sangs @253a *//
K10D0213_H0214:253a-2: dma' ba'i gnas na ni 'dod chen pa rnams so //
K10D0213_H0214:253a-4: de ltar ngo mtshar rnam pa gnyis te; log par
K10D0213_H0214:253a-5: nges pa'i gang zag ni 'dod chen yin par soms
K10D0213_H0214:253a-6: shig / yang dag par nges pa'i gang zag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K10D0213_H0214:253a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos yin par soms shig /
K10D0213_H0214:253a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sor mo'i phreng ba la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0213_H0214:253a-11: myur du rab tu byung la skyabs gsum du 'gro ba zungs shig /
K10D0213_H0214:253a-12: de nas sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas slar gsol pa /
K10D0213_H0214:253a-13: theg pa 'di ni theg chen te //
K10D0213_H0214:253a-14: chags med ye shes zhes kyang bgyi; ;theg pa gcig pu skyabs gcig ste //
K10D0213_H0214:253a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa don dam skyabs //
K10D0213_H0214:253a-16: chos dang sangs rgyas don gcig ste //
K10D0213_H0214:253a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku //
K10D0213_H0214:253a-18: dge 'dun de bzhin gshegs kyi ming //
K10D0213_H0214:253a-19: dge 'dun nyid ni de bzhin gshegs //
K10D0213_H0214:253a-20: chos dang dge 'dun gnyis ni thabs kyi skyabs lags te //
K10D0213_H0214:253a-21: de bzhin gshegs ni thabs med skyabs dang don dam skyabs //
K10D0213_H0214:253a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa skyabs med rnams kyi skyabs lags te //
K10D0213_H0214:253a-23: de yi slad du de bzhin gshegs la skyabs su mchi //
K10D0213_H0214:253b-0: ji ltar shing @253b kun za 'dod pas ni shing kun bza' bya zhes //
K10D0213_H0214:253b-1: shing kun yang dag bor nas shing kun bcos ma za ba ni //
K10D0213_H0214:253b-2: 'jig rten dag na bdag la mi phan nad ni sos mi 'gyur //
K10D0213_H0214:253b-3: 'jig rten de 'dra'i phyugs med sman pa stong gis gso mi nus //
K10D0213_H0214:253b-4: de bzhin du ni skyabs gcig yongs btang ste //
K10D0213_H0214:253b-5: thabs kyis skyabs su gang dag 'jug pa yang //
K10D0213_H0214:253b-6: de lta bu yi sbrang bu gzhan med de //
K10D0213_H0214:253b-7: de ni sangs rgyas stong gis gso mi nus //
K10D0213_H0214:253b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0213_H0214:253b-10: khyod gzhon nu'i tshul khrims srungs shig /
K10D0213_H0214:253b-11: de nas sor mo'i phreng bas /
K10D0213_H0214:253b-12: bcom ldan 'das la slar 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0213_H0214:253b-13: 'jig rten na gzhon nu gang lags /
K10D0213_H0214:253b-14: bsnyen pa rdzogs pa gang lags /
K10D0213_H0214:253b-15: 'jig rten na dge sbyong gsal ba gang lags /
K10D0213_H0214:253b-16: 'jig rten na sbyin gnas gang lags /
K10D0213_H0214:253b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur pa dang /
K10D0213_H0214:253b-18: sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0213_H0214:253b-20: gang 'jig rten na skyabs gcig pu don dam pa'i
K10D0213_H0214:253b-21: skyabs su ma 'tshal ba de dag thabs gnyis po
K10D0213_H0214:253b-22: la bkod do // de gnyis 'jig rten na skyabs lags te /
K10D0213_H0214:253b-23: gzhon nur gyur nas bsnyen par rdzogs pa mi gsal ba de dge sbyang lags sam /
K10D0213_H0214:253b-24: gang skyabs gcig pu ma 'tshal ba de dag skyabs sbyor ba lta ga la 'gyur /
K10D0213_H0214:254a-0: gang bcom ldan 'das la don dam @254a *//
K10D0213_H0214:254a-1: pa'i skyabs su ma 'tshal ba de dag thog ma
K10D0213_H0214:254a-2: nas skyabs su 'gro ba'ang ma sbyangs na dge sbyong
K10D0213_H0214:254a-4: de ltar skyabs su mchi ba'ang gsal bar ma 'tshal na /
K10D0213_H0214:254a-5: sbyin gnas su lta ga la 'gyur /
K10D0213_H0214:254a-7: thabs kyi skyabs kyi bye brag ma 'tshal ba de ni 'jig rten na gzhon nu mi mkhas pa'o //
K10D0213_H0214:254a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0213_H0214:254a-10: khyod srog gcod pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims srungs shig /
K10D0213_H0214:254a-11: de nas sor mo'i phreng bas /
K10D0213_H0214:254a-12: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0213_H0214:254a-13: bdag ni srog gcod pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims mi 'dzin gyi /
K10D0213_H0214:254a-14: nya pa ltar srog gcod pa'i tshul khrims 'dzin to //
K10D0213_H0214:254a-15: srog ces bgyi ba ni nyon mongs pa bye ba
K10D0213_H0214:254a-16: ste; de dag bzung nas gang gsod pa de ni
K10D0213_H0214:254a-17: 'jig rten na srog gcod pa spangs pa 'dzin pa'o
K10D0213_H0214:254a-19: yang na rgyags pa bcom ste /
K10D0213_H0214:254a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0213_H0214:254a-23: khyod rdzun smra ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims zungs shig /
K10D0213_H0214:254a-24: bcom ldan 'das la sor mo'i phreng bas slar 'di
K10D0213_H0214:254a-25: skad ces gsol to; ;bdag ni rdzun smra ba spangs
K10D0213_H0214:254a-27: chos thams cad ni mi bden pa ste /
K10D0213_H0214:254a-28: bdag ni mi bden par smra ba'i chos ston to //
K10D0213_H0214:254b-0: de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos @254b nyid de mi bden pa zhes bgyi'o //
K10D0213_H0214:254b-1: chos thams cad ni stong pa ste /
K10D0213_H0214:254b-2: dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos thams cad kyang rdzun zhes bgyi'o //
K10D0213_H0214:254b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'jig rten dang mthun
K10D0213_H0214:254b-6: pa'i rjes su 'jug pa rnams kyang mi bden pa'i
K10D0213_H0214:254b-7: chos zhes bgyi'o // bdag 'jig rten du skyes te
K10D0213_H0214:254b-8: rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas; bdag gis
K10D0213_H0214:254b-10: gzhan gyi sbyin pa'i dngos po la spyad do //
K10D0213_H0214:254b-12: bdag gis ni rma dgu nas de'i bgyi ba bgyi'o //
K10D0213_H0214:254b-14: bdag gis so shing blang ngo //
K10D0213_H0214:254b-15: bdag gis mig rtsi byug go /
K10D0213_H0214:254b-18: bdag gi mgo bo breg go /
K10D0213_H0214:254b-19: bdag mal du zhugs te nyal lo //
K10D0213_H0214:254b-20: rked pa na bzhig byung ngo //
K10D0213_H0214:254b-26: bdag ni shing zad pa'i me bzhin du yongs su
K10D0213_H0214:254b-27: mya ngan las 'da'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
K10D0213_H0214:254b-28: chos thams cad ni mi bden pa ste /
K10D0213_H0214:254b-29: ji tsam du thabs kyis bya ba dang /
K10D0213_H0214:254b-30: 'jig rten na thabs kyis bya ba la bdag yongs
K10D0213_H0214:254b-31: su spyod pa'i bar du rdzun smra ba'i tshul khrims
K10D0213_H0214:254b-32: mi spyod do // de kho na'i chos bden pa'i chos rab tu bshad kyi nga las nyon cig /
K10D0213_H0214:254b-33: btsun pa moonggal gyi bu chen po /
K10D0213_H0214:254b-34: gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bden pa yang dag pa nyid /
K10D0213_H0214:255a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sku /
K10D0213_H0214:255a-11: de kho na las skyes pa'i sku; de ji ltar ston /
K10D0213_H0214:255a-12: de bas ni mi bden pa'i chos kyis 'byung ngo //
K10D0213_H0214:255a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa thams cad ni mi bden pa dang bral ba ste /
K10D0213_H0214:255a-14: de bas na sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
K10D0213_H0214:255a-16: ba lang rdzi dag be'u shi ba'i pags pas be'u ltar byas te brid nas /
K10D0213_H0214:255a-17: be'u gzhan len du 'jug pa de bzhin du /
K10D0213_H0214:255a-18: 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'brang zhing spyod pa na /
K10D0213_H0214:255a-19: sangs rgyas ni 'on pa lta bur gyur nas /
K10D0213_H0214:255a-22: ba ltar 'on pa rnams kyang bdag cag gi de
K10D0213_H0214:255a-23: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
K10D0213_H0214:255a-24: pa'i sangs rgyas 'on pa'ang 'jig rten du byung ste
K10D0213_H0214:255a-25: / bdag cag kyang 'on pa'o snyam ste shin tu dga'o //
K10D0213_H0214:255a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyang 'on pa snyam du sems shing
K10D0213_H0214:255a-27: bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gyi gtso bor 'gyur ro
K10D0213_H0214:255a-29: chos de kho na'i gnas la des bdag nyid bskul te /
K10D0213_H0214:255a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad
K10D0213_H0214:255a-31: chos la 'god pa de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes so
K10D0213_H0214:255a-32: // gal te be'u dngos po slar bstan na /
K10D0213_H0214:255b-2: ba lang rdzis be'u gsob bstan te /
K10D0213_H0214:255b-3: rtsva spar gang byin nas mi bden pa'i chos la dul bar byed do //
K10D0213_H0214:255b-4: de bzhin du gal te sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo
K10D0213_H0214:255b-5: nyid don dam pa'i sku; 'jig rten du bstan du
K10D0213_H0214:255b-6: zin na / sku de sus mthong bar nus te /
K10D0213_H0214:255b-7: ji ltar ba la rtsva'i chang pa ltar 'jig rten
K10D0213_H0214:255b-8: thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar byed pas chos
K10D0213_H0214:255b-9: rnams bden pa ma yin no //
K10D0213_H0214:255b-10: de bas na sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du yan lag gang dang /
K10D0213_H0214:255b-11: gang gis sems can rnams chos la rtsom par sems can mang po yongs su smin par mdzad de /
K10D0213_H0214:255b-12: de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid do //
K10D0213_H0214:255b-13: de'i phyir bdag kyang mi bden pa'i chos la spyod de /
K10D0213_H0214:255b-14: ji tsam du sems can thams cad mi bden pa
K10D0213_H0214:255b-15: yin pa de tsam du bdag kyang rdzun smra ba
K10D0213_H0214:255b-17: de'i tshe bdag gi tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K10D0213_H0214:255b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0213_H0214:255b-20: khyod chang 'thung ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims zungs shig
K10D0213_H0214:255b-21: ;de nas sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la
K10D0213_H0214:255b-22: slar tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa /
K10D0213_H0214:255b-23: chang spong ba yi tshul khrims bdag mi 'dzin //
K10D0213_H0214:255b-24: chang las myos pa skyes pa'i tshul khrims 'dzin //
K10D0213_H0214:255b-25: chang 'thungs pa ni nga rgyal skye bar brjod //
K10D0213_H0214:255b-26: 'gro 'chag rtag tu rab bde chang zhes bgyi //
K10D0213_H0214:255b-27: bde gshegs snying po theg pa che las skyes //
K10D0213_H0214:256a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rtag brten ther zug ces //
K10D0213_H0214:256a-3: rab tu dga' ngoms ha ha legs brjod pa //
K10D0213_H0214:256a-4: phun sum tshogs pa de ni bdag thob shog /
K10D0213_H0214:256a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0213_H0214:256a-7: khyod 'khrig pa'i chos spangs pa'i tshul khrims zungs shig /
K10D0213_H0214:256a-8: de nas sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la
K10D0213_H0214:256a-9: tshigs su bcad pas slar 'di skad ces gsol to
K10D0213_H0214:256a-10: // bdag ni 'khrig pa spangs pa'i khrims mi 'dzin //
K10D0213_H0214:256a-11: rtag tu gzhan gyi bud med g-yem chags 'dzin //
K10D0213_H0214:256a-12: ba dan lta bur smad tshod khyim na spyod //
K10D0213_H0214:256a-13: bud med kun gyi drung du'ang rab tu chags //
K10D0213_H0214:256a-14: ting 'dzin ro ni bdag gi chung ma ste //
K10D0213_H0214:256a-15: chos gzhan dga' ba gzhan gyi bud med chags //
K10D0213_H0214:256a-16: dpa' zhing bden la dga' ba bdag gi bu //
K10D0213_H0214:256a-17: snying rje byams pa bu mo mang po ste //
K10D0213_H0214:256a-18: stong pa 'di ni bdag gi khyim lags so //
K10D0213_H0214:256a-19: mtha' yas pha rol phyin pa bdag gi mal //
K10D0213_H0214:256a-20: nyon mongs rnams ni bdag gi g-yog lags te //
K10D0213_H0214:256a-21: zas ni ldam ngag gsang ba bstan pa lags //
K10D0213_H0214:256a-22: bdag gi skyed mos tshal ni gzungs rnams te //
K10D0213_H0214:256a-23: byang chub yan lag me tog dag gis brgyan //
K10D0213_H0214:256a-24: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes 'bras bu ste //
K10D0213_H0214:256a-25: bdag gi chos kyi tshig ni sdong po lags //
K10D0213_H0214:256a-26: de la sogs pa khyim gnas rtse dga' mchog /
K10D0213_H0214:256b-0: byis @256b pa rnams kyi spyod yul 'di ma lags //
K10D0213_H0214:256b-1: 'di ni mkhas pa rnams kyi rang bzhin chos //
K10D0213_H0214:256b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0213_H0214:256b-4: khyod ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims zungs shig /
K10D0213_H0214:256b-5: de nas sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas slar gsol pa /
K10D0213_H0214:256b-6: bdag ni ma byin len spong khrims mi 'dzin //
K10D0213_H0214:256b-7: gzhan nor rku ba'i tshul ni rtag tu 'dzin //
K10D0213_H0214:256b-8: ma byin pa ni byang chub lags zhes bgyi //
K10D0213_H0214:256b-9: de ni sus kyang su la'ang ma stsal te //
K10D0213_H0214:256b-10: byang chub shing drung bcom ldan bzhugs nas kyang //
K10D0213_H0214:256b-11: khyod kyis rnyed pa med cing bshig pa'ang med //
K10D0213_H0214:256b-12: de ni chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin te //
K10D0213_H0214:256b-13: de ni bla na med pa'i chos lags so //
K10D0213_H0214:256b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0213_H0214:256b-15: 'o na sor mo'i phreng ba; khyod gar dang /
K10D0213_H0214:256b-16: rol mo spangs pa'i tshul khrims zungs shig /
K10D0213_H0214:256b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das la sor mo'i phreng bas
K10D0213_H0214:256b-18: tshigs su bcad pas slar 'di skad ces gsol to
K10D0213_H0214:256b-19: // bdag ni gar mkhan bzhin du rtag tu gar bgyid de //
K10D0213_H0214:256b-20: dri za'i dbyangs snyan sgrog cing glu blangs bro brdungs te //
K10D0213_H0214:256b-21: legs so legs so de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston //
K10D0213_H0214:256b-22: legs brjod gar bgyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos //
K10D0213_H0214:256b-23: me sbyin lta bur sgra snyan theg chen mdo sde bklag /
K10D0213_H0214:256b-24: mi'am ci dang dri za'i rnga dang rnga bran dang //
K10D0213_H0214:257a-2: sems can gang rnams de ltar rtag tu mchod bgyid pa //
K10D0213_H0214:257a-3: de dag 'jig rten du ni kho mor ming gcig par //
K10D0213_H0214:257a-4: phyi dus sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes de bzhin gshegs pa gsung //
K10D0213_H0214:257a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0213_H0214:257a-7: khyod ci gcig ci zhes slobs shig /
K10D0213_H0214:257a-8: sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la slar 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0213_H0214:257a-10: sems can thams cad ni zas la gnas so zhes
K10D0213_H0214:257a-11: nyan thos kyi theg pa las byung ba'i tshig ste
K10D0213_H0214:257a-12: / theg pa chen po la de lta bu'i rnam pa ma mchis so //
K10D0213_H0214:257a-13: theg pa chen po pa rnams ni rtag tu mig mi 'dzums shing brtan pa'o //
K10D0213_H0214:257a-15: sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la gnas pa'o //

K10D0213_H0214:295b-22: 'di las phyi rol par gyur pa'am /
K10D0213_H0214:295b-24: mtshams med pa byas par gyur pa /

K10D0213_H0214:295b-27: sh'akya thub pa'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis kyang sems

K10D0213_H0214:296a-10: kyis nan tan gyis shig ces ngas lam bstan to
K10D0213_H0214:296a-11: // lam bstan pa rnam pa gnyis te /

K10D0213_H0214:296a-22: rdu bcad pa'i lam ngas bstan to //

K10D0213_H0214:297a-4: nyes pas dri ma lnga la sogs pa'i dri ma

K10D0213_H0214:297a-31: ba'i don te / yid rang bzhin gyis dag pa

K10D0213_H0214:297b-14: tshigs su bcad pa de'i don ni 'di'o //

K10D0213_H0214:297b-16: yid gtso yid kyi rang bzhin te /
K10D0213_H0214:297b-17: yid ni rab tu 'khrugs pa yin //

K10D0213_H0214:297b-26: nang du zhugs pa'i don to //

K10D0213_H0214:299a-0: rol mo la 'dus pa'i nang du skyes bu gar mkhan gar @299a *//

K10D0213_H0214:300b-8: de ni bsod nams kyi phung po'o //
K10D0213_H0214:300b-13: nyon mongs pa'i dug gi phyir te /
K10D0213_H0214:300b-15: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshig ni skyon chags pa'i
K10D0213_H0214:300b-16: ya mtshan can dam pa'i chos 'jig pa rnams bdag
K10D0213_H0214:300b-17: gi nyon mongs pa mi zad pa ltar de bag
K10D0213_H0214:300b-19: tshul ma yin par gnod pa'ang byed du 'jug ste /
K10D0213_H0214:300b-20: de dag ni bdag la mchod pa yin no //
K10D0213_H0214:300b-21: ji ltar bdag sdug par 'dod pa dang /
K10D0213_H0214:300b-25: bdag spong bar 'dod pas skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan
K10D0213_H0214:300b-26: rnams chad pas gcod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs
K10D0213_H0214:300b-27: pa'i snying po rig pa yin no /
K10D0213_H0214:300b-29: ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i slad du sangs rgyas rnams sha mi gsol lam /
K10D0213_H0214:300b-30: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0213_H0214:301a-1: bar 'khor ba'i tshe rabs de dag la sems can thams cad mar ma gyur pa dang /
K10D0213_H0214:301a-2: sring mor ma gyur pa gang yang med do //
K10D0213_H0214:301a-3: khyir gyur pa'ang par gyur te; 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten ni bro mkhan bzhin no //
K10D0213_H0214:301a-4: de bas na bdag gi sha dang /
K10D0213_H0214:301a-5: gzhan gyi sha'ang sha gcig pa yin pas /
K10D0213_H0214:301a-6: sangs rgyas rnams sha mi gsol lo //
K10D0213_H0214:301a-9: sems can thams cad kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings te /
K10D0213_H0214:301a-10: dbyings gcig tu gyur pa'i sha za bar 'gyur bas /
K10D0213_H0214:301a-11: sangs rgyas rnams sha mi gsol lo //
K10D0213_H0214:301a-16: dar gyi srin bu la sogs pa rang gi dbyings kyi sha ma lags sam /
K10D0213_H0214:301a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0213_H0214:301a-20: sangs rgyas ni 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi lus spangs pa yin te /
K10D0213_H0214:301a-21: sangs rgyas ni zang zing med pa yin na chags
K10D0213_H0214:301a-22: pa'i rdzas ci la'ang bsten pa de ni gnas ma
K10D0213_H0214:301a-23: yin te / zang zing la bsnyen pa ni thabs kyi chos nyid do //
K10D0213_H0214:301a-24: 'di rdzas gcig nas gcig tu 'ongs pa la bsnyen par byed de /
K10D0213_H0214:301a-25: rdzas gang nas 'byung ba de dang der bsnyen bar mi bya'o //
K10D0213_H0214:301a-26: gsod pa'i lag ma yin par gcig nas gcig tu 'ongs pa ni bsnyen du rung ngo //
K10D0213_H0214:301b-0: tshong 'dus gcig na lham mkhan gyis ko ba @301b las lham drubs te /
K10D0213_H0214:301b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phul na /
K10D0213_H0214:301b-2: gcig nas gcig tu mchis pa de bzhes sam /
K10D0213_H0214:301b-4: gal te ma he rang chos bzhin du gsum nas /
K10D0213_H0214:301b-5: ma he bdag po gdol pa las ko ba blangs te /
K10D0213_H0214:301b-6: lham mkhan btsal nas lham du drubs te /
K10D0213_H0214:301b-7: tshul khrims dang ldan pa la stsal na de gcig nas gcig tu mchis pa lags sam /
K10D0213_H0214:301b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0213_H0214:301b-9: ma he chos bzhin du shi bar gyur la /
K10D0213_H0214:301b-10: ma he bdag pos lham drug tu bcug nas tshul
K10D0213_H0214:301b-11: khrims dang ldan pa la byin na blang bar bya'am
K10D0213_H0214:301b-12: / 'on te ma blangs na dge slong dang mthun nam /
K10D0213_H0214:301b-13: snying rje med pa yin te /
K10D0213_H0214:301b-14: tshul khrims ral bar mi 'gyur ba ma yin no //
K10D0213_H0214:301b-16: rmo brko yang bgyir mi rung ngo //
K10D0213_H0214:301b-17: chu mi gtsang bas btsos pa'i zas kyang mi blang ngo //
K10D0213_H0214:301b-18: de lta lags na dge slong dag de lta bu gda'o //
K10D0213_H0214:301b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0213_H0214:301b-20: de ni 'jig rten gyi 'du shes zhes bya ste /
K10D0213_H0214:301b-21: gal te dge bsnyen yod na ni zas dang /
K10D0213_H0214:301b-22: skom chu gtsang ma dang sbyor cig /
K10D0213_H0214:301b-23: gang na dge bsnyen yod par rmo brko mi bya'o //
K10D0213_H0214:301b-24: gang na dge bsnyen med pa der sangs rgyas kyis kyang ji ltar bya /
K10D0213_H0214:301b-26: chu'i nang na'ang srog chags yod /
K10D0213_H0214:301b-27: nam mkha' la'ang srog chags yod do //
K10D0213_H0214:302a-0: gal te de ltar rnam par dag @302a *//
K10D0213_H0214:302a-1: pa grub pa rnams la sdig par mi 'gyur ram /
K10D0213_H0214:302a-2: rnam par dag pa grub pa de dag ji ltar rgyu /
K10D0213_H0214:302a-3: de dag 'jig rten na mi 'dri ba zhes bya ba'i dri ba'o //
K10D0213_H0214:302a-6: 'jig rten pa'ang ring zhig tshun chad bdag nyid sha za ba la mi gnas so //
K10D0213_H0214:302a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0213_H0214:302a-8: gang 'jig rten pa la sangs rgyas kyi tshig dang
K10D0213_H0214:302a-9: mthun pa yod pa de'ang thams cad du thams cad
K10D0213_H0214:302a-10: sangs rgyas kyi tshig tu rig par bya'o //
K10D0213_H0214:302a-12: 'jig rten pa rnams kyang thar pa brjod de /
K10D0213_H0214:302a-13: de dag la thar pa med kyi /
K10D0213_H0214:302a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la thar pa yod do //
K10D0213_H0214:302a-15: de dag la'ang rab tu 'byung ba yod de /
K10D0213_H0214:302a-16: de dag gi rab tu 'byung ba ma yin no //
K10D0213_H0214:302a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba yod do //
K10D0213_H0214:302a-18: 'jig rten pa la'ang sha za ba ni bdag nyid za ba'o zhes brjod de /
K10D0213_H0214:302a-19: de'ang bdag nyid bdag nyid kyi sha la mi za ste /
K10D0213_H0214:302a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la ni bdag nyid kyi sha za bar nges so //
K10D0213_H0214:302a-22: 'jig rten du ya mtshan can thams cad byung ba mdo sde 'di la bstan pa nyan 'dod dam /
K10D0213_H0214:302a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0213_H0214:302a-27: sngon 'das pa'i dus na byung ba grangs med pa'i
K10D0213_H0214:302b-0: bskal pa bas kyang ches grangs med @302b pa; bskal
K10D0213_H0214:302b-1: pa yangs pa bas kyang ches yangs pa /
K10D0213_H0214:302b-2: dpag tu med pa bas kyang ches dpag tu med pa de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K10D0213_H0214:302b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa ko san ta bzang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du grong 'dir byung ste /
K10D0213_H0214:302b-4: de'i tshe ya mtshan can med cing ya mtshan can gyi ming yang med do //
K10D0213_H0214:302b-5: sems can theg pa chen po bar gyur te /
K10D0213_H0214:302b-6: sems can rnams shin tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur to //
K10D0213_H0214:302b-7: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de 'jig rten gyi
K10D0213_H0214:302b-8: khams 'dir lo mang du zhugs nas yongs su mya
K10D0213_H0214:302b-10: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa'ang lo mang du gnas nas /
K10D0213_H0214:302b-11: dam pa'i chos nub par gyur pa'i tshe /
K10D0213_H0214:302b-12: dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa bri ba'i dus na /
K10D0213_H0214:302b-13: chos ma yin pa'i phyogs 'phel ba'i tshe /
K10D0213_H0214:302b-14: dge slong sangs rgyas kyi blo gros zhes bya ba zhig dgon pa na gnas te /
K10D0213_H0214:302b-15: dge slong de la sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa gcig gis /
K10D0213_H0214:302b-16: rin thang med pa'i gos byin nas /
K10D0213_H0214:302b-17: dge slong des rjes su bzung ba'i phyir blangs te /
K10D0213_H0214:302b-18: ai shin 'dar ra ba'i drung nas phar bstan te song ba dang /
K10D0213_H0214:302b-19: ai shin 'da'i mis gos de mthong nas sems bzlog ste /
K10D0213_H0214:302b-20: nub mo mun khung na dge slong de'i thad du song ste /
K10D0213_H0214:302b-21: gos de phrogs nas ri khrod du khrid de /
K10D0213_H0214:302b-23: shing la lag pa gyen du dam por bcings te song ngo //
K10D0213_H0214:302b-24: de'i nub mo mun khung na me tog 'thu ba'i bram ze skon pa thogs te /
K10D0213_H0214:303a-1: te; tsam pa ka zhig gi drung na stag 'dug pas skrag ste /
K10D0213_H0214:303a-2: stag des bsad la thug pa dang /
K10D0213_H0214:303a-4: bdag nyid rab tu mi dga' zhing song song na dge sbyong gcer bur bcings pa mthong nas /
K10D0213_H0214:303a-5: kye ma dge sbyong dgon pa dur smrig can 'dir 'ongs na /
K10D0213_H0214:303a-6: dur smrig gi rgyal mtshan gyis ni thar par mi 'gyur ba lta zhig snyam ste /
K10D0213_H0214:303a-7: lag pa bsgreng nas lus gcer bur byung la dka' thub spyad par bya'o snyam nas /
K10D0213_H0214:303a-8: lam 'di nges par thar pa'i lam du legs par
K10D0213_H0214:303a-9: grub pa yin nam zhes dam pa'i chos gzhig pa'i
K10D0213_H0214:303a-10: phyir bdag gi gos ngan pa bor te /
K10D0213_H0214:303a-11: skra btogs nas mgo reg gcer bu pa'i dge sbyong du 'gyur te /
K10D0213_H0214:303a-12: de las dge sbyong gcer bu pa byung ngo //
K10D0213_H0214:303a-13: dge slong de bdag nyid bcings pa khrol nas shing shun blangs te sa ser pos byugs nas /
K10D0213_H0214:303a-14: thang la 'gro ba bram ze zhig gis mthong nas /
K10D0213_H0214:303a-15: sngar bshad pa bzhin du mthong ba dang /
K10D0213_H0214:303a-16: 'di ni dur smrig gyon pa'i dge slong ste /
K10D0213_H0214:303a-18: btsag gis byugs te song na /
K10D0213_H0214:303a-19: thar pa'i lam ni 'di yin pa snyam ste /
K10D0213_H0214:303a-21: ci zhes de kun tu rgyu bar gyur te /
K10D0213_H0214:303a-22: de las mur 'dug kun tu rgyu ba byung ngo //
K10D0213_H0214:303a-23: dge slong phye ma red chur zhugs te /
K10D0213_H0214:303a-24: rang gi klad pa'i rma chus bkrus nas skra 'jam pos klad pa'i rma g-yogs te /
K10D0213_H0214:303b-0: sbrul bsad pa'i ras ba lang rdzis bor ba @303b gyon te /
K10D0213_H0214:303b-1: khrus byed pa de skyes bu shing 'thu ba gzhan zhig gis mthong ste /
K10D0213_H0214:303b-2: snga ma ltar dge slong de nyon mongs pa mthong nas /
K10D0213_H0214:303b-3: dge sbyong 'di ni ngur smrig gyon te /
K10D0213_H0214:303b-4: rgyal mtshan ngur smrig gis ni thar par mi 'gyur ba snyam du bsams nas /
K10D0213_H0214:303b-5: ral pa ring por byas te /
K10D0213_H0214:303b-6: rtsva gos gyon nas dus gsum du khrus byed pa'i dka' thub spyod pa yin du bzung nas /
K10D0213_H0214:303b-7: de dge ba yin nam zhes 'di nyid thar pa'i lam ste /
K10D0213_H0214:303b-8: gzhan ma yin no zhes dka' thub can du gyur te /
K10D0213_H0214:303b-9: de tshun chad ya mtshan can dka' thub byed pa byung ngo //
K10D0213_H0214:303b-10: dge sbyong de chur zhugs te rma mang po thams cad la rang gis yog ste /
K10D0213_H0214:303b-11: rang gi lus rdul gyis gang zhing sbrang ma 'dus
K10D0213_H0214:303b-12: zhing dge slong de skra 'jam bos g-yogs pa mthong
K10D0213_H0214:303b-14: phyugs bdag po rnams de ltar byung ngo //
K10D0213_H0214:303b-15: dge slong de ba lang gi lci ba yar ke
K10D0213_H0214:303b-16: ma'i me bus te bsro ba skyes bu nyon mongs
K10D0213_H0214:303b-17: pa gzhan zhig gis mthong nas /
K10D0213_H0214:303b-18: ba lang gi lci ba'i ril bu can thog ma de nas byung ngo //
K10D0213_H0214:303b-19: dge slong de rma la sdug bsngal reg par shes nas /
K10D0213_H0214:303b-20: dpa' bo ltar 'dug pa skyes bu nyon mongs pa gzhan zhig gis snga ma bzhin du mthong ste /
K10D0213_H0214:303b-21: ngur smrig gyon pa ni thar par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas ci legs par 'gro'am snyam ste /
K10D0213_H0214:303b-22: mi g-yo ba'i sar 'gro ba thar pa yin snyam du bsams nas /
K10D0213_H0214:303b-23: mi g-yo ba'i sa mya ngan du 'gro bar gyur to //
K10D0213_H0214:304a-0: de ltar ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa drug gi bar du @304a *//
K10D0213_H0214:304a-1: gyur pa rnams kyang so so nas der lhags te /
K10D0213_H0214:304a-3: ci lta ba mthong nas log pa'i lta bas gzhan dang /
K10D0213_H0214:304a-7: phan tshun du ri dvags su mthong nas /
K10D0213_H0214:304a-8: ri dvags gsad snyam du bsams nas /
K10D0213_H0214:304a-9: gcig la gcig gsod pa de bzhin du ya mtshan dgu bcu rtsa drug kyang de ltar byung ngo //
K10D0213_H0214:304a-11: dbyar zla ra ba ri dvags rnams smig rgyu ba la chu yin snyam du bsams te /
K10D0213_H0214:304a-12: 'chi bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du dam pa'i chos
K10D0213_H0214:304a-13: nub par 'gyur ba'i dus na dge slong gi gzhi
K10D0213_H0214:304a-16: de ltar 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims dang /
K10D0213_H0214:304a-18: bya ba'i mchog thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'o //
K10D0213_H0214:304a-19: dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus na de lta bu byung na chos nub par 'gyur ro //
K10D0213_H0214:304a-21: de bzhin du bdag gi de kho na 'di 'dra de 'dra'o zhes log par lta ba bzhin du /
K10D0213_H0214:304a-25: 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang ldem po ngag mi shes
K10D0213_H0214:304a-26: pas bdag med pa sangs rgyas kyi tshig go zhes
K10D0213_H0214:304a-27: mur 'dug byung ba ltar rnam par rtog go /
K10D0213_H0214:304a-28: rjes su dpag pas tshugs pa'i 'jig rten pa la'ang gti mug gi chos kyi dbang du song ngo //
K10D0213_H0214:304a-29: 'jig rten las 'das pa la'ang ldem po dag tu
K10D0213_H0214:304b-0: bshad pa mi shes pas shes pa nyams @304b te;
K10D0213_H0214:304b-1: de'i phyir phyogs gnyis spangs te /
K10D0213_H0214:304b-2: bdag tu gtogs pa'i chos kyi de kho na nyid dang /
K10D0213_H0214:304b-4: dge 'dun gyi de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa dbu ma'i lam du bstan to //
K10D0213_H0214:304b-5: dbu ma'i lam zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po'i bla dvags so //
K10D0213_H0214:304b-6: sor mo'i phreng bas smras pa /
K10D0213_H0214:304b-7: dbu ma'i lam mi shes pas sems can rnams dbu ma'i lam gzhan du rtog go /
K10D0213_H0214:304b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0213_H0214:304b-10: mdo sde 'di bshad pa thos nas sems can mang
K10D0213_H0214:304b-11: du mdo sde 'di la yid ches par 'gyur ro
K10D0213_H0214:304b-12: // ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can mang du mdo sde 'di la smod par 'gyur ro //
K10D0213_H0214:304b-13: sor mo'i phreng bas gsol pa /
K10D0213_H0214:304b-15: phyogs gang du mdo sde la smod pa ji snyed 'byung ba dang /
K10D0213_H0214:304b-16: 'dod chen pa ji snyed 'byung ba bshad du gsol //
K10D0213_H0214:304b-17: phyogs gang du sems can thams cad la phan par
K10D0213_H0214:304b-18: 'gyur ba ston pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pas bshad du
K10D0213_H0214:304b-19: gsol / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0213_H0214:304b-20: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yul gyi dbus 'dir mdo
K10D0213_H0214:304b-21: sde la smod pa'i sems can bye ba brgya stong
K10D0213_H0214:304b-22: phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'byung ngo //
K10D0213_H0214:304b-23: 'dod chen pa bye ba phrag bdun 'byung ngo //
K10D0213_H0214:304b-24: shar phyogs su mdo sde la smod pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'byung ngo //
K10D0213_H0214:304b-25: 'dod chen pa bye ba phrag bdun byung ngo //
K10D0213_H0214:305a-0: lho phyogs su mdo sde la smod pa stong phrag @305a *//
K10D0213_H0214:305a-2: 'dod chen pa bye ba phrag drug cu 'byung ngo //
K10D0213_H0214:305a-3: nub phyogs su mdo sde la smod pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu byung ngo //
K10D0213_H0214:305a-4: 'dod chen pa bye ba phrag lnga bcu 'byung ngo //
K10D0213_H0214:305a-5: byang phyogs su mdo sde la smod pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'byung ngo //
K10D0213_H0214:305a-6: 'dod chen pa bye ba phrag bzhi bcu 'byung ngo /
K10D0213_H0214:305a-7: kha che'i yul du'ang nga'i bstan pa glegs bam lhag ma'i mdzod dang /
K10D0213_H0214:305a-9: bha ru ka tsar yang nga'i glegs bam lhag ma'i mdzod du 'gyur ro //
K10D0213_H0214:305a-10: ri bhin dhya la'ang de bzhin no; kha che yul
K10D0213_H0214:305a-11: gyi dge slong rnams bsgrub pa'i don mi shes nas
K10D0213_H0214:305a-12: theg pa chen po thams cad la smod pa 'byung
K10D0213_H0214:305a-13: ste / nga la skur pa de ji lta bya zhes pa'ang ngo tsha ba skye'o //
K10D0213_H0214:305a-14: lho phyogs pa'i rgyud du theg pa chen po ston par 'gyur te /
K10D0213_H0214:305a-15: nan tan snying por byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
K10D0213_H0214:305a-16: spyad pa spyod pa dngos po chen po brgyad dang
K10D0213_H0214:305a-17: bral ba / de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang /
K10D0213_H0214:305a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po brtan pa'o zhes ston par 'gyur ro //
K10D0213_H0214:305a-21: nga'i nyan thos dge slong dang /
K10D0213_H0214:305a-23: dge bsnyen dang; dge bsnyen ma rnams nan tan snying por byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0213_H0214:305a-24: nga'i bstan pa khur du thogs par 'gyur ro //
K10D0213_H0214:305b-0: @305b lho phyogs su bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa gnas par 'gyur ram /
K10D0213_H0214:305b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0213_H0214:305b-4: lho phyogs pa'i rgyud du nga'i bstan pa lo du ma zhig gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10D0213_H0214:305b-5: khyod lta bu shin tu dka' ba byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang gi srog btang nas /
K10D0213_H0214:305b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang /
K10D0213_H0214:305b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa ther zug dang /
K10D0213_H0214:305b-8: de de bzhin gshegs pa g-yung drung ngo zhes sems
K10D0213_H0214:305b-9: can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir de
K10D0213_H0214:305b-10: bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston par 'gyur te /
